## useMaybeLayoutContext (hook)

Returns a layout context from the `LayoutContext` if it exists, otherwise `undefined`<!-- -->.

### Import

```typescript
import { useMaybeLayoutContext } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

{% usage name="usemaybelayoutcontext" package="@livekit/components-react" exampleCount=0 /%}

**Returns:**

[LayoutContextType](./react//layoutcontexttype.md) \| undefined
